dict.string: Next Zoom accesses upcoming events to find your next Zoom meeting link.
Nezt Zoom accesses upcoming events to find your next Zoom meeting link and events may contain contact data.
Next Zoom access upcoming reminders to find your next Zoom meeting link.
Next Zoom accesses upcoming events to find your next Zoom meeting link which can expose location data.
Next Zoom accesses upcoming events to find your next Zoom meeting link which can expose location data.
